instructions:
Combine olive oil and sesame oil in a frying pan that has a tight lid. Sauté garlic and onion for about 3
minutes. Add cabbage and caraway seeds and toss to coat with oil. Cover and sweat down the cabbage over
very low heat for about 20 minutes. It should have some firmness, but not hard to chew. Sprinkle with
crumbled bacon. Serves 2.
name: Sauteed Cabbage
